data.description:
Play the worldâ€™s second most popular sport with 2+ billion fans now in an epic VR cricket experience. Final Overs takes cricket gaming to the next level in VR with innovative physics, aesthetic world-class stadiums, & many more exciting gameplay features.

Step into the jam-packed virtual stadiums & establish your cricketing legacy as an aspiring cricketer. Take on AI-powered bowling side, or compete with your friends in local multiplayer matches. 

With 20+ million balls played, Final Overs continues to provide pulse-pounding excitement to its players. The game has received wide appreciation from professional & non-professional players for its ability to help players reproduce real-life cricket shots in VR. 

**Here's what you will get to enjoy in the game:**

- PvP matches in local multiplayer mode
- Multiple cricket formats: quick match, T20, ODI
- Track your progress in your profile
- AI-driven intelligent fielding & bowling system
- AI Coach match summary & tips
- Multiple difficulty levels
- Immersive world-class stadiums
- Practice net
- Regular updates

These, and many other incoming features make Final Overs worth the experience. DOWNLOAD now and rise as a star in VR cricket!

changelog.change_log: Significantly improved visual quality of stadiums

New Features
- Added unique celebration animation for each bowler
- You can now see replay highlights of your best shots of current batter (from within replay)
- Added bowling scorecard in Local Multiplayer

Bug Fixes
- Stats not updating on selecting modes and difficulties
- Bug fix: Fielders sometimes caught the ball too high
- Bug fix: Replay played too fast sometimes, randomly

New Features
- Added unique celebration animation for each bowler
- You can now see replay highlights of your best shots of current batter (from within replay)
- Added bowling scorecard in Local Multiplayer

Bug Fixes
- Stats not updating on selecting modes and difficulties
- Bug fix: Fielders sometimes caught the ball too high
- Bug fix: Replay played too fast sometimes, randomly

I am excited to announce a brand new stadium: HABIBI CRICKET GROUND (free)


Other changes:
Added new character for umpire with better animations
Added release notes in dressing room
Bug fix: Only Quick Match stats were seen
Minor bug fixes

I am excited to announce a brand new stadium: HABIBI CRICKET GROUND (free)

Other changes:
- Added new character for umpire with better animations
- Added release notes in dressing room
- Minor bug fixes
